description.en: Platon Finance is the first insured crypto-financial ecosystem based on a Ethereum blockchain, connecting the classic fiat money market with modern digital currencies via its own ERC-20 standard token, PlatonCoin. Thanks to high-security standards by the latest Symantec technologies and the crypto insurance against cyber theft by a Lloyd's syndicate, Platon Finance is bringing a unique blockchain-based solution to the increasing security issues around digital assets.
